dataset: Bangladesh enrollment analysis

washb_bangladesh_enrol.Rd

Bangladesh enrollment analysis dataset

data(washb_bangladesh_enrol)

Format

A data frame with 5,551 observations and 73 variables.

dataid

Compound ID

clusterid

Cluster ID)

hhid

Household ID

block

Randomization block ID

tr

Randomized treatment assignment

union

Administrative union (q4008)

fracode

FRA code (q4001)

svydate

Survey date

Nhh

Number of persons in household (q012)

Nlt18

N indivs in HH <=18y

Ncomp

Total indivs in compound

momage

Mother's age, years

momheight

Maternal height (median)

momedu

Mother's education (category)

momeduy

Mother, years of education (q009)

dadeduy

Father, years of education (q010)

dadagri

Father works in agriculture (q011)

landacre

Acres of land owned (q4110)

hfias

HFIAs food insecurity score (0-27)

hfiacat

HFIAS food insecurity category

tubewell

Primary water source: shallow tubewell (q1010)

watmin

Dist (mins) to primary water source

storewat

Store drinking water (q1003)

treatwat

Reported treating water today or yesterday (q1008)

odmen

Daily OD, adult men (q801a)

odwom

Daily OD, adult women (q801b)

odch815

Daily OD, children 8-15 (q801e)

odch38

Daily OD, children 3-8 (q801d)

odchu3

Daily OD, children <3 (q801c)

latown

Own their latrine (not shared) (q816)

latslab

Latrine has concrete slab (q809_7)

latseal

Latrine has functional water seal (q809_9a)

latfeces

No visible feces on slab/floor of latrine

potty

Has a potty for child defecation

humfeces

Human feces observed in house/compound (q4201,4203,4205)

humfecesch

Human feces obs in loc where child spends most time (q4203)

hwlat

Has handwashing loc w/in 6 steps of latrine

hwlatwat

Has handwashing loc w/in 6 steps of latrine w/ water

hwlatsoap

Has handwashing loc w/in 6 steps of latrine w/ soap

hwkit

Has handwashing loc w/in 6 steps of kitchen

hwkitwat

Has handwashing loc w/in 6 steps of kitchen w/ water

hwkitsoap

Has handwashing loc w/in 6 steps of kitchen w/ soap

hwsw

Prim handwashing loc has water (q704_1)

hwss

Prim handwashing loc has soap (q704_2-6)

hwsws

Prim handwashing loc has water+soap (q704_1-6)

roof

Improved roof material (tin, cement)

walls

Improved wall material (wood, brick, tin)

floor

Improved floor (wood, concrete)

cement

Has cement floor (q4103)

elec

Household has electricity

asset_radio

households have radio

asset_tvbw

households have B/W television

asset_tvcol

households have color television

asset_refrig

households have Refrigerator

asset_bike

households have bicycle

asset_moto

households have motorcycle

asset_sewmach

households have sewing machine

asset_phone

number of land phone

asset_tv

Has bw or color TV

asset_wardrobe

Has >=1 wardrobe

asset_table

Has >=1 table

asset_chair

Has >=1 chair

asset_clock

Has >=1 clock

asset_khat

Has >=1 khat

asset_chouki

Has >=1 chouki

asset_mobile

Has >=1 mobile

n_asset_wardrobe

number of wardrobes

n_asset_table

number of Tables

n_asset_chair

number of Chair

n_asset_clock

number of clock

n_asset_khat

number of Khat

n_asset_chouki

number of chouki

n_asset_mobile

number of mobile phone
